Structs/Meta.html#/s:10DragonflAI4MetaV8.name: duration
Structs/Meta.html#/s:10DragonflAI4MetaV8.abstract: The total duration of this moderation action.

Structs/ModeratorSuccess.html#/s:10Drago.name: meta
Structs/ModeratorSuccess.html#/s:10Drago.abstract: Data which does not form part of the analysis, e.g. performance.

Structs/Analysis.html#/s:10DragonflAI8An.name: inferences
Structs/Analysis.html#/s:10DragonflAI8An.abstract: The top 3 raw categories and confidences assigned

Structs/Analysis.html#/s:10DragonflAI8An.name: decision
Structs/Analysis.html#/s:10DragonflAI8An.abstract: a yes/no decision about the image based on the Config

Structs/AlgorithmConfig.html#/s:10Dragon.name: blockThreshold
Structs/AlgorithmConfig.html#/s:10Dragon.abstract: A percentage confidence level at which content is flagged e.g. 70 (the default)

Structs/Account.html#/s:10DragonflAI7Acc.name: debugDescription
Structs/Account.html#/s:10DragonflAI7Acc.abstract: Log an Account instance with truncated key and secret.

Structs/Account.html.name: Account
Structs/Account.html.abstract: Represents your customer account as an SDK user

Structs/ConsoleLogger.html.name: ConsoleLogger
Structs/ConsoleLogger.html.abstract: A simple logger which wraps NSLog and may be initialised with any log level

Structs/NullLogger.html.name: NullLogger
Structs/NullLogger.html.abstract: A very simple logger to null. Allows logging to be completely disabled.

Protocols/StreamModeratorDelegate.html#/.name: moderatorDidDropFrame(_:)
Protocols/StreamModeratorDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when a frame was dropped to keep up with the stream. This method is optional

Protocols/StreamModeratorDelegate.html#/.name: moderatorDidProduceNewResult(_:result:)
Protocols/StreamModeratorDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called upon a new result being produced. By default this is upon a change to the decision.

Protocols/StreamModeratorDelegate.html.name: StreamModeratorDelegate
Protocols/StreamModeratorDelegate.html.abstract: Interface that receives the live results from a StreamModerator

Protocols/Logging.html.name: Logging
Protocols/Logging.html.abstract: Log output from the SDK is passed to a logger.

Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.name: co_dragonflai_statusUpdatedNotification
Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.abstract: Notification sent when the SDK’s licence status changes

Enums/SDKError.html#/s:10DragonflAI8SDKE.name: badAccountConfig
Enums/SDKError.html#/s:10DragonflAI8SDKE.abstract: Error thrown by SDK methods, when configured with invalid or missing license details.

Enums/SDKError.html#/s:10DragonflAI8SDKE.name: missingUserID
Enums/SDKError.html#/s:10DragonflAI8SDKE.abstract: Error thrown by SDK methods, when configured to require customer-provided UserID,

Enums/SDKError.html#/s:10DragonflAI8SDKE.name: notLicensed
Enums/SDKError.html#/s:10DragonflAI8SDKE.abstract: Error thrown by SDK methods, when license checks have failed.

Enums/SDKError.html#/s:10DragonflAI8SDKE.name: cannotReachServer
Enums/SDKError.html#/s:10DragonflAI8SDKE.abstract: Error thrown by SDK methods when the licensing server cannot be reached and the grace period has expired.

Enums/LicenseStatus.html#/s:10DragonflAI.name: noAccountProvided
Enums/LicenseStatus.html#/s:10DragonflAI.abstract: Account credentials should be provided via the useAccount(...) method.

Enums/LicenseStatus.html#/s:10DragonflAI.name: unknown
Enums/LicenseStatus.html#/s:10DragonflAI.abstract: License check not completed successfully at this point

Enums/LicenseStatus.html#/s:10DragonflAI.name: noLicense
Enums/LicenseStatus.html#/s:10DragonflAI.abstract: Licence check has completed, and the result is no current license to use the SDK.

Enums/LicenseStatus.html#/s:10DragonflAI.name: licensed
Enums/LicenseStatus.html#/s:10DragonflAI.abstract: Licence check has completed, and the result is a valid license to use the SDK.

Enums/LicenseMode.html#/s:10DragonflAI11.name: standard
Enums/LicenseMode.html#/s:10DragonflAI11.abstract: This strategy will opportunistically check the licensing server, if required, as early as possible.

Enums/LicenseMode.html#/s:10DragonflAI11.name: customerUserID
Enums/LicenseMode.html#/s:10DragonflAI11.abstract: This strategy will delay licensing checks (and hence use of the SDK) until after the UserID is set,

Enums/ModeratorError.html#/s:10DragonflA.name: notImplemented
Enums/ModeratorError.html#/s:10DragonflA.abstract: Implementation missing — An experimental feature which is incomplete. This will never be returned by documented API.

Enums/ModeratorError.html#/s:10DragonflA.name: loadingBundledModel
Enums/ModeratorError.html#/s:10DragonflA.abstract: The resources needed to run this algorithm could not be loaded.

Enums/ModeratorError.html#/s:10DragonflA.name: convertingInputImage
Enums/ModeratorError.html#/s:10DragonflA.abstract: The input image could not be converted into a compatible format.

Enums/ModeratorError.html#/s:10DragonflA.name: runningModel
Enums/ModeratorError.html#/s:10DragonflA.abstract: There was an internal fault during moderation.

Enums/Decision.html#/s:10DragonflAI8Deci.name: ok
Enums/Decision.html#/s:10DragonflAI8Deci.abstract: An approval from the Moderator — restricted content was not found

Enums/Decision.html#/s:10DragonflAI8Deci.name: blocked(category:)
Enums/Decision.html#/s:10DragonflAI8Deci.abstract: A rejection from the Moderator — restricted content was found

Enums/Decision/Category.html.name: Category
Enums/Decision/Category.html.abstract: The title and confidence % for blocked content

Enums/Algorithm.html#/s:10DragonflAI9Alg.name: nudity1
Enums/Algorithm.html#/s:10DragonflAI9Alg.abstract: Original DragonflAI algorithm release. We recommend you use a newer release.

Enums/Algorithm.html#/s:10DragonflAI9Alg.name: defaultConfig
Enums/Algorithm.html#/s:10DragonflAI9Alg.abstract: A default AlgorithmConfig as used by the Moderator initialiser.

Enums/Algorithm.html#/s:10DragonflAI9Alg.name: installedAlgorithms()
Enums/Algorithm.html#/s:10DragonflAI9Alg.abstract: A dictionary of algorithms which have resources installed in the app bundle.

Enums/Decision.html.name: Decision
Enums/Decision.html.abstract: Represents a moderation decision about an image’s contents

Enums/ModeratorError.html.name: ModeratorError
Enums/ModeratorError.html.abstract: Runtime errors that may be produced by a Moderator in response to incompatible input data or internal faults.

Enums/SDKError.html.name: SDKError
Enums/SDKError.html.abstract: Errors that may be produced by core SDK functionality, e.g. licensing checks.

Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.name: status
Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.abstract: Provides the current license status of the SDK

Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.name: useAccount(_:)
Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.abstract: Set the account details used for licensing checks

Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.name: useLogger(_:)
Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.abstract: Set the logger used for the whole SDK.

Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.name: useLogger(logger:)
Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.abstract: Set the logger used for the whole SDK.

Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.name: useUserID(_:)
Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.abstract: Set a unique user ID for licensing purposes. Optional.

Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.name: sendMetrics(moderationTally:)
Classes/DragonflAICore.html#/s:10Dragonf.abstract: Opt into sending metrics to DragonflAI. Default is false, meaning no metrics are sent.

Classes/StreamModerator/NewResultStrateg.name: all
Classes/StreamModerator/NewResultStrateg.abstract: Pass all moderation results, i.e. for every frame, to the delegate.

Classes/StreamModerator/NewResultStrateg.name: decisionChanged
Classes/StreamModerator/NewResultStrateg.abstract: Only pass moderation results to the delegate when the decision has changed.

Classes/StreamModerator/NewResultStrateg.name: NewResultStrategy
Classes/StreamModerator/NewResultStrateg.abstract: Represents when to give the StreamModeratorDelegate a new result.

Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.name: delegate
Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.abstract: A delegate must be set to receive results.

Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.name: resetFPSStats()
Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.abstract: Resets the statistics used to provide inputFramesPerSecond and processedFramesPerSecond.

Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.name: inputFramesPerSecond
Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.abstract: The FPS being consumed by the moderator.

Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.name: processedFramesPerSecond
Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.abstract: The FPS being moderated, i.e. not dropped, by the moderator.

Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.name: process(frame:)
Classes/StreamModerator.html#/s:10Dragon.abstract: Pass all stream frames to this method for moderation.

Classes/Moderator.html#/s:10DragonflAI9M.name: init(config:)
Classes/Moderator.html#/s:10DragonflAI9M.abstract: Make a moderator for images — uses nudity1 algorithm.

Classes/Moderator.html#/s:10DragonflAI9M.name: moderate(_:completed:)
Classes/Moderator.html#/s:10DragonflAI9M.abstract: Get a moderation decision Result (via closure) for an individual UIImage

Classes/Moderator.html#/s:10DragonflAI9M.name: moderate(_:)
Classes/Moderator.html#/s:10DragonflAI9M.abstract: Get a moderation decision for an individual UIImage as a Promise.

Classes/Moderator.html#/s:10DragonflAI9M.name: moderate(_:)
Classes/Moderator.html#/s:10DragonflAI9M.abstract: Get a moderation decision for an individual UIImage as a Promise.

Classes/StreamModerator.html.name: StreamModerator
Classes/StreamModerator.html.abstract: A content moderator for video streams, e.g. the frames captured from device cameras.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
